ygData.subject: new question
ygData.msgSnippet: OK back to ingame stuff.. I was discussing EQ with a friend and fellow player the other day and I came up with a question. It has been a long time since I have
ygData.messageBody:
OK back to ingame stuff..

I was discussing EQ with a friend and fellow player the other day and I
came up with a question. It has been a long time since I have seriously
played, I have returned for brief periods, but nothing fulltime. My
first question is..is there some npc you can go to ( or some other
method) that will tell you what you faction is...ya know..who like you
and who doesnt. It has been a long time and I dont recall who and what
factions I was building and destroying. Im thinking its as easy as the
seer in PoK that tells you what steps are needed for Planar progression.

Oh and btw... in my sheer boredom, i went through the EQ file and
hooked all the songs from the different zones so they'd play in their
own playlist on my media player. If you listen to them all in series
like this, it actually isnt a bad soundtrack. Just thought id let you
all in on that.

AS always,

Greg
